kv8.7:5.1_0: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.3_0: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:5.5_0: atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.7_0: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṁ atthi rasāyatanaṁ, tāya jivhāya taṁ rasaṁ sāyati …pe…
kv8.7:5.8_0: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:6.2_0: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.4_0: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:6.6_0: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.9_0: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:7.1_0: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, na ca tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.3_0: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, na ca tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:7.5_0: atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, na ca tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.8_0: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, na ca tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:8.2_0: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, na ca tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:8.5_0: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, na ca tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:9.1_0: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:9.3_0: Atthi tattha mūlagandho sāragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho āmagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandhoti?
kv8.7:10.1_0: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṁ atthi rasāyatanaṁ, tāya jivhāya taṁ rasaṁ sāyatīti?
kv8.7:10.3_0: Atthi tattha mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambilaṁ madhuraṁ tittakaṁ kaṭukaṁ
kv8.7:10.3_1: loṇiyaṁ khāriyaṁ lambilaṁ kasāvo sādu asādūti?
kv8.7:11.1_0: Atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:11.3_0: Atthi tattha kakkhaḷaṁ mudukaṁ saṇhaṁ pharusaṁ sukhasamphassaṁ dukkhasamphassaṁ garukaṁ lahukanti?
kv8.7:12.4_0: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittaṁ jivhānimittaṁ kāyanimittanti?
kv8.7:12.6_0: Hañci atthi tattha ghānanimittaṁ jivhānimittaṁ kāyanimittaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
